name: Fear of Heights
detailed_description: This simulation takes place on the electric gondola of a window cleaner, against the tall building of a crowded city. The therapist has control over the gondola, and is able to rise, lower and pause it. The gondola is able to lift the client to heights even beyond the rooftop. At the more challenging heights, however, the client has the opportunity to enjoy a beautiful view over the city during sunset.
